function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coronavirus persistence on surfaces and materials","Impact":"Potential for prolonged surface contamination and transmission","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces and materials","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV-C light, heat-based disinfection","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Variation in coronavirus persistence based on temperature and humidity","Impact":"Inconsistencies in virus survival rates in different environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Controlled temperature and humidity environments, regular disinfection","Technologies":"Climate control systems, humidity monitors, disinfection protocols","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building management, facilities management"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of biocidal agents in inactivating coronaviruses","Impact":"Potential for ineffective virus inactivation during disinfection","Mitigation":"Use of approved biocidal agents, proper disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Approved disinfectants, UV-C light, chemical fogging systems","People":"Cleaning staff, disinfection teams","Owner":"Facilities management, infection control teams"}]}
